scenes.description: A video montage on the big screen showcases ReGLOSS's past releases and covers leading up to their 3D debut.
The intro sequence for the song 'Symmetry' begins.

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS、いくよ！
subtitles.english: ReGLOSS, let's go!

subtitles.original: 漠然としていた　fun
subtitles.english: I was vaguely wishing...

subtitles.original: 欲していた　fun
subtitles.english: ...for some fun.

subtitles.original: 日常に違和感
subtitles.english: I felt out of place in daily life,

subtitles.original: うんざりしていた
subtitles.english: I was fed up with it all.

subtitles.original: 着慣れた　ありきたりな眺め
subtitles.english: Gazing at the same old scenes,

subtitles.original: 理屈を超える変化を求めていた
subtitles.english: I was looking for a change beyond logic.

subtitles.original: 窮屈で退屈な日々の中
subtitles.english: Amidst the cramped and boring days,

subtitles.original: 突然　君は現れた
subtitles.english: you suddenly appeared.

subtitles.original: 全身の細胞　駆け巡るように
subtitles.english: Like it's racing through every cell in my body,

subtitles.original: 走り出した　未完成なストーリー
subtitles.english: an unbraked story has begun.

subtitles.original: モノクロであった景色が今
subtitles.english: The scenery that was once monochrome...

subtitles.original: 君と出会い　カラフルに彩る　pan-u-wa
subtitles.english: ...is now colored vibrantly because I met you.

subtitles.original: 心奪われた　気まぐれな瞬間ハートビート
subtitles.english:
My heart was stolen by this
capricious Momentary Heartbeat.

subtitles.original: エラティックの狭間　もう一人じゃない　煌めく星
subtitles.english:
In the threshold of the erratic,
I'm no longer alone, my sparkling star.

subtitles.original: 描く未来予想図は
subtitles.english: In the future we envisioned,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を引き寄せたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to draw in the same dream.

subtitles.original: 果てしない旅路の向こうで
subtitles.english: Beyond the endless journey,

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まないロマンが待っている
subtitles.english: a never-ending romance awaits.

subtitles.original: 気付いた時にはね
subtitles.english: By the time I noticed,

subtitles.original: Can't be without you
subtitles.english: Can't be without you.

subtitles.original: いつまでも君と一緒なら
subtitles.english: If I'm with you forever,

subtitles.original: ここから先広がる宇宙
subtitles.english: the universe will expand from here.

subtitles.original: 晴れ渡り空　飛び出して
subtitles.english: Jump out into the clear sky,

subtitles.original: 気分は上々　外行っちゃおう
subtitles.english: the mood is just right, let's go out.

subtitles.original: 既定の苦労は終わりにして
subtitles.english: Put an end to the usual hardships,

subtitles.original: 全て叶え　空を飛ぼう
subtitles.english: I'll grant everything, let's fly to the sky.

subtitles.original: 時計の針が
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock...

subtitles.original: 回り回る
subtitles.english: ...keep turning and turning.

subtitles.original: 限られた時の中で
subtitles.english: Vividly, within this limited time,

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに　Dance time
subtitles.english: it's dance time.

subtitles.original: 心奪われた　気まぐれな瞬間ハートビート
subtitles.english:
My heart was stolen by this
capricious Momentary Heartbeat.

subtitles.original: エラティックの狭間　もう一人じゃない　煌めく星
subtitles.english:
In the threshold of the erratic,
I'm no longer alone, my sparkling star.

subtitles.original: 描く未来予想図は
subtitles.english: In the future we envisioned,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を引き寄せたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to draw in the same dream.

subtitles.original: 果てしない旅路の向こうに
subtitles.english: Beyond the endless journey,

subtitles.original: 紛れもない奇跡があるはず
subtitles.english: there's a miracle without a doubt.

subtitles.original: さよならメランコリー　止められはしないこの衝動
subtitles.english: Goodbye melancholy, I can't stop this impulse.

subtitles.original: 突き進むだけさ　なりふり構わず　Are you ready?
subtitles.english:
Just keep moving forward without
worrying about appearances, are you ready?

subtitles.original: 限界は最大　重なる多次元の異次元
subtitles.english:
The limit is maximum,
multidimensional and infinite.

subtitles.original: 散りばめた煌めき　夜空みんな聴いて
subtitles.english:
Spread out the sparkle,
listen to it, everyone in the night sky.

subtitles.original: 喜びは悲しみの場合分け　分かち合っていこう
subtitles.english: Let's share joy and double the sadness.

subtitles.original: 僕らなら　どこまでも
subtitles.english: If it's us, we can go anywhere.
